directions: Muddle 3 lemon wedges, mint leaves, and agave nectar in a lowball glass until fragrant. Add crushed ice and rum; top with club soda. Pour mixture back forth into a mixing glass or cocktail shaker until blended.
Serve in lowball glass, garnished with a sprig of fresh mint and wedge of lemon.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce club soda, or as needed
title: Creolo Cocktail
